text: is a Shinto shrine in the northeastern part of the city of Kochi, Japan. The shrine's main festival is held from March 11–13 every year."Nationwide List of Ichinomiya," p. 1.; retrieved 2011-08-010 Some of the shrine is National Important Cultural Properties. The shrine's Shinane Festival, held on August 25, is known as one of the three major festivals of Kochi. ==References== * Ponsonby-Fane, Richard. (1964). Visiting Famous Shrines in Japan. Kyoto: Ponsonby-Fane Memorial Society. == Other websites == * Official home page Category:Shikinai Taisha Category:Kokuhei Chūsha Category:Ichinomiya Category:Beppyo shrines
title: Tosa Shrine
